name: Garbodor
description: The Trash Heap Pokémon. They absorb garbage and make it part of their bodies. They shoot a poisonous liquid from their right-hand fingertips.

abilities.name: Stench
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, roll a d10. On a 10, the attacker flinches.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.description: When an attack hits this Pokémon, its speed increases by 5 feet, but its AC is temporarily reduced by 1 until the end of battle (for a maximum reduction of -5).

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.description: This Pokémon deals damage to an attacker equal to half of the damage received when knocked out by a melee move.
